name: ReFit
short_description:
The ReFit Eclipse plugin performs automatic refactoring of the Fit test specs (http://fit.c2.com) and of the relevant code when a refactoring process is invoked.

NOTE: The project is still in Beta, but we think stable enough, to be used. Just try. 

For more information about the project, installation and use instructions see https://sourceforge.net/apps/trac/fitrefactoring/

We are pleased about the many downloads. We are also pleased for your feedback/review - many thanks!
summary: Eclipse Plug-in for Automatic Refactoring of Fit Tests.
